titleStmt.title: Woman with No Lover Short Harran
SHAWI Corpus
titleStmt.funder: Funded by the FWF Austrian Science Fund under the number P 33574

publicationStmt.distributor: Austrian Center for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

monogr.title: A Digital Dictionary of Shawi Arabic

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.
Private URIs using the dict prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a entry in the SHAWI glossary.

spanGrp.span: She is a girl whose cousin put the ring (on) her and got engaged to her when she was still young. She has been ‘reserved’ for her cousin.
She is a girl in the campground; the girls of the encampement are all in love, all the girls are in love. Each one has her fiancé, but this girl has no fiancé, because she is reserved for her cousin.

When she was walking among the Arab (men) on the campground she put the niqāb on and she was walking like that. The young men of the village said, “Hey, all of our (girls) are in love, why does this girl not want anyone?”

One of them said, “I really want to be in love with her, I want her.” They said, “She won’t want you.” He said, “No, she definitely does, because I want her.” When she went out to gather firewood, when she gathered firewood, she also put the niqāb on like that and gathered wood.
This man followed her and when he reached her he said, “O girl, o the one who has taken the niqāb!
I see the cheek and the eyes are good, and the nose is like the handle of the sword, like the curvature of the bow,” the man said to her.

She said to him “Get off, kid! Before my uncles come to you and beat you. I have been engaged with (a guy called) Minnāʕ since I was breastfed. I do not exchange the jewellery with money. Knock it off, kid, before my uncles come to you and beat you up.”
He said to her, “Show me the way to peace!” She said to him, “Follow the stream out of the excuse being a hunter and live on!”
